text: Khawa jarra John in neelramma aheisuok-ah, baptize ithole inruoiya Pathian chong aleiril.1:4. John in neelramma aheisuok-ah, baptize ithole inruoiya Pathian chong aleiril. Manuscript lekkhat achu hintia injia Baptist John neelramma aheisuok-ah Pathian chong aleiril. “Ningmanu-ah inphut heikir inlang baptize thoru” halli “Ningmanu rakip Pathian in anara-ngaidam pisik eii,” Ama'n mipuidiang aleiti.
